levels.description:
Detonates all deployed Robotters, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Mayer's ATK as Arts damage to nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>Stunning</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>The exploded Robotters will be recycled</>

<@ba.rem>The exploded Robotters will be recycled</>
